alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Custer; Hooker; Keith; Lincoln; Logan; McPherson; Perkins; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 8:42PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN PERKINS...EASTERN KEITH...SOUTHEASTERN HOOKER...LINCOLN...LOGAN...MCPHERSON...WESTERN CUSTER...SOUTHERN BLAINE AND THOMAS COUNTIES THROUGH 930 PM CDT/830 PM MDT/... At 842 PM CDT/742 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles south of Thedford to near Wallace. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... North Platte, Grant, Stapleton, Thedford, Brewster, Tryon, Sutherland, Hershey, Arnold, Paxton, Brady, Wallace, Maxwell, Madrid, Elsie, Dunning, Halsey, Gandy, Dickens and Lake Maloney State Recreation Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 205 and 255. Highway 61 between mile markers 63 and 68. Highway 92 between mile markers 189 and 261. Highway 97 between mile markers 1 and 53. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 136 and 204. Highway 83 between mile markers 62 and 149. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Custer; Hooker; Keith; Lincoln; Logan; McPherson; Perkins; Thomas
